title: DRDO Recruitment 2025 - Apply Offline for Research Associate (DYSLQT Pune) Posts
description: The Defence Research and Development Organisation (DRDO) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 01 Research Associate (DYSLQT Pune) Posts. Interested and eligibile candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their Any degree, M.E./M. Tech and Ph.D. candidates can apply for the DRDO Recruitment 2025 . The interested applicants can apply in offline mode. Here we have mentioned the educ...
